languages.text: "Итак, согласно завещанию, все состояние Беллардо отправляется... не его бесполезному сыну Касу. И не его безмозглому помощнику Дэггену. А Фиделио — таинственному новому наследнику. Однако, как я полагаю, есть сторона, которая хочет вмешаться в процесс". {n}Капеллан смотрит прямо на вас и усмехается.{/n}

"And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Итак, согласно завещанию, все состояние Беллардо отправляется... не его бесполезному сыну Касу. И не его безмозглому помощнику Дэггену. А Фиделио — таинственному новому наследнику. Однако, как я полагаю, есть сторона, которая хочет вмешаться в процесс". {n}Капеллан смотрит прямо на вас и усмехается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. It goes to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

languages.text: “既然如此，根据死者的遗嘱，贝拉多的所有财产都归于……不是他那个废物儿子卡斯，也不是他那个没脑子的大副达根，而是归于某位名叫菲迪奥的神秘继承人。不过，我相信某位重要人物打算介入遗产的继承仪式。”{n}牧师直视着你，窃笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，根据死者的遗嘱，贝拉多的所有财产都归于……不是他那个废物儿子卡斯，也不是他那个没脑子的大副达根，而是归于某位名叫菲迪奥的神秘继承人。不过，我相信某位重要人物打算介入遗产的继承仪式。”{n}牧师直视着你，窃笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: «Por lo tanto, conforme lo estipulado en el testamento del difunto, la fortuna de Bellardo queda... no en manos del inútil de su hijo Kas, ni de su descerebrado contramaestre Daggen, sino de Fidelio, alguien de quien no sabemos nada. Sin embargo, creo que hay cierta parte interesada en intervenir en este proceso». {n}El capellán te mira fijamente y se ríe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por lo tanto, conforme lo estipulado en el testamento del difunto, la fortuna de Bellardo queda... no en manos del inútil de su hijo Kas, ni de su descerebrado contramaestre Daggen, sino de Fidelio, alguien de quien no sabemos nada. Sin embargo, creo que hay cierta parte interesada en intervenir en este proceso». {n}El capellán te mira fijamente y se ríe.{/n}

languages.text: 「なので故人の意志に従い、ベラルドの全財産は…彼の無能な息子キャスでも、能なし航海士のダゲンでもなく、新たに現れた謎の相続人、フィデリオに引き継がれます。とはいえ、この決断に納得がいかない方たちもおいででしょう」{n}教戒官は真っすぐこちらを見て笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なので故人の意志に従い、ベラルドの全財産は…彼の無能な息子キャスでも、能なし航海士のダゲンでもなく、新たに現れた謎の相続人、フィデリオに引き継がれます。とはいえ、この決断に納得がいかない方たちもおいででしょう」{n}教戒官は真っすぐこちらを見て笑った。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Verstorbene hat bestimmt, dass das gesamte Bellardo-Vermögen ... nicht an seinen nutzlosen Sohn Kas geht. Auch nicht an seinen hirnlosen Ersten Offizier Daggen. Sondern an Fidelio – einen geheimnisvollen neuen Erben. Allerdings denke ich, dass eine bestimmte Partie dabei gerne intervenieren würde." {n}Ordenspriester sieht dich direkt an und kichert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Verstorbene hat bestimmt, dass das gesamte Bellardo-Vermögen ... nicht an seinen nutzlosen Sohn Kas geht. Auch nicht an seinen hirnlosen Ersten Offizier Daggen. Sondern an Fidelio – einen geheimnisvollen neuen Erben. Allerdings denke ich, dass eine bestimmte Partie dabei gerne intervenieren würde." {n}Ordenspriester sieht dich direkt an und kichert.{/n}

languages.text: « Donc, conformément aux souhaits du défunt, toute la fortune de Bellardo revient... non pas à Kas, son incapable de fils, ni à Daggen, son imbécile de lieutenant, mais à Fidélio, une personne tout à fait mystérieuse dont nul n'avait jamais entendu parler. Cependant, il me semble que quelqu'un voulait intervenir, » {n}ajoute Chapelain avec un petit rire en se tournant vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Donc, conformément aux souhaits du défunt, toute la fortune de Bellardo revient... non pas à Kas, son incapable de fils, ni à Daggen, son imbécile de lieutenant, mais à Fidélio, une personne tout à fait mystérieuse dont nul n'avait jamais entendu parler. Cependant, il me semble que quelqu'un voulait intervenir, » {n}ajoute Chapelain avec un petit rire en se tournant vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: "Merhumun vasiyetine göre Bellardo'nun tüm varlığı... Değersiz oğlu Kas'a gitmiyor. Kıt akıllı ikinci kaptanı Daggen'a da gitmiyor. Gizemli, yeni vâris Fidelio'ya gidiyor. Fakat malum bir şahsın buna engel olmak isteyeceğini tahmin ediyorum." {n}Papaz dosdoğru sana bakıp gülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And so, according to the deceased's will, all of Bellardo's fortune goes... not to his worthless son Kas. Not to his brainless mate Daggen. But to Fidelio — a mysterious new heir. However, I believe a certain party would like to intervene in this process." {n}Chaplain looks straight at you and chuckles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Merhumun vasiyetine göre Bellardo'nun tüm varlığı... Değersiz oğlu Kas'a gitmiyor. Akılsız kaptanı Daggen'a da gitmiyor. Gizemli ve yeni bir vâris olan Fidelio'ya gidiyor. Fakat malum bir kişinin, buna engel olmak isteyeceğini tahmin ediyorum." {n}Papaz dosdoğru sana bakıyor ve kıkırdıyor.{/n}
